Package com.bergerkiller.bukkit.common.config

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BasicConfiguration
    A basic YAML configuration implementation
    CompressedDataReader
    A compression based Data reader
    CompressedDataWriter
    A compression based Data writer
    ConfigurationNode  
    DataReader
    An abstract version of a Data reading class used to read from a source File
    DataWriter
    An abstract version of a Data writing class used to write to a destination File
    FileConfiguration  
    HeaderBuilder
    Can handle header formatted lines and store them in an internal buffer
    NodeBuilder
    Can handle node formatting lines to keep track of the currently active node
    TempFileOutputStream
    A FileOutputStream wrapper that writes to a temporary file prior to closing the stream and flushing the data to the official output file.
